<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Clinging Shadows Stance](/Spells.aspx?ID=737)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 229 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until you leave the stance
</row>

</column>

---

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 negative damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184), [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits. 

While in _clinging shadows stance_, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), and to the DC for creatures to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) from you.
name: Clinging Shadows Stance
